div.div: Our goal is to provide a place to host hosts the children inside a protected shelter. Likely, the place would be a safe building but in emergency situations such a disasters or extreme poverty the place could be more temporary homes protecting the children. The place should contain different areas for playing, doing homework, cooking and sleeping. These areas should have the minimum material and space to perform the associated task. For example, the bedroom should contain mattresses or any other furniture appropriate to the country providing a good rest to the children.
